title: New: Psychedelic Black – Melting
body:
**Psychedelic Black**, the creative outlet of Boise’s **Logan Hyde**, has just unveiled his debut track, _Melting_.

Four and a half minutes of colourful, melody-driven rock and roll, it’s flecked with hints of classic 70’s rock, mixed with more modern, romanticised 00’s indie. This is a hugely promising first step. Check it out below, and keep up with **Psychedelic Black** on [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/psychedelicblack).
